import {useState, useCallback} from "react" import { Card, Form, Button, TextField, FormLayout } from "@shopify/polaris" const MailingList = () => { const [url, setUrl] = useState(''); const handleSubmit = useCallback((_event) => setUrl(''), []); const handleUrlChange = useCallback((value) => setUrl(value), []); return

john.smith@example.com

 } export default MailingList
